content.raw: Actually, if you add all the gazebo_models models the polaris will still drift because then you're also using the new starting pen which causes the polaris to drift (and atlas as well). So the most ideal solution would be to just download gazebo_models and add the updated polaris model to your ~/.gazebo/models directory and ignore the other model changes for now I guess.
